channel.title: Way Down - Tome x Xavior
channel.description:
[here](https://soundcloud.com/melodiesbytome/way-down-x-xavior-1)
first taste of my auxy ep called diode, got some dope guests there including anechoik, austin, and xavior. Hope you like it !

item.title: Way Down - Tome x Xavior
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Ah, very good. Haven’t heard you guys in a bit, this is a great combo. As usual, vocals on point and production awesome. Always love how Xavior is sparse but so effective, but I guess I’m more of a ‘please keep the dynamics in my music’ kinda guy haha…

Read full topic
